description.narrative: Insatsen kommer att fokusera på färdigställandet av NGOCCs strategiska plan 2018-2022 som kommer att utgöra ett nödvändigt underlag gällande beslut om kärnstöd till kvinnorörelsen. För att genomföra detta behövs en konsult samt styrelse-, personal- och medlemsmöten med organisationer hållas. Beslut om förlängd insats kommer också innebära att NGOCC kan genomföra de nyckelaktiviteter som det idag saknas resurser för inklusive främjandet av Bill of Rights and national referendum bill; engagemang för och analys av den nationella budgeten för 2018 från ett jämställdhetsperspektiv; organisationsrevisionen för 2017 samt övriga administrativa kostnader.

The contribution will focus on the finalisation of the development of the NGOCC Strategic Plan for 2018-2022 as a pre-requisite for consideration for core support to the women's movement . Specifically, this will include engaging a Consultant as well as conducting of meetings with the Board, Staff and Member Organisations. The contribution will also support NGOCC's funding gap for 2017 to facilitate the completion of key activities such as those related to advocacy on the Bill of Rights and national referendum bill; engagement and analysis of the 2018 national budget from a gender perspective; the 2017 organisational audit as well as other administrative costs.

sector.narrative: Women’s rights organisations and movements, and government institutions

policy-marker.narrative: Aid Targeting the Objectives of the Convention on Biological Diversity

Reproductive, Maternal, Newborn and Child Health (RMNCH)

description.narrative: Some of the results achieved include: - The completion of a new strategic plan for NGOCC for the period 2018 to 2022 - The Minister of Justice's announcement of a roadmap for the holding of a national referendum in order to ensure an expanded bill of rights - The establishment and launch of a Male parliamentary Committee on Gender Equality. This was an unexpected result.
No indicator available - only a description of the activity results is published
